short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a Touch of Whimsy to Your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with the Miku Chibi theme, designed to bring charm, fun, and functionality to your everyday online activities. 

Immerse yourself in a world of cuteness with delightful Miku Chibi visuals adorning every new tab you open. This theme is more than just an aesthetic upgrade; it’s a productivity-enhancing toolset tailored to make your browsing smoother and more enjoyable.

Key Features of the Miku Chibi Theme
Shortcuts for Quick Access: Enjoy the convenience of having your favorite websites and applications just a click away. Customize your shortcuts to access essential tools, social media platforms, and frequently visited pages effortlessly.

Integrated Time Display: Stay on schedule with a sleek, always-visible clock on your new tab. Perfect for managing your time while working, studying, or browsing.

Bookmark Management: Keep your important links organized and accessible with an intuitive bookmark display. Add, delete, or update bookmarks directly from the new tab interface.

Personalized Notes Section: Jot down ideas, reminders, or to-do lists without needing an additional app. Your notes are securely stored, ensuring easy access whenever you need them.

Dynamic Theme Switching: Tailor your browsing experience by choosing between different variations of the Miku Chibi theme. Whether you prefer vibrant tones or a more muted palette, there’s a look to match your mood.
